prompt.title: Knowledge

parameters.knowledgePieceContent: Pavol is actively involved in the tech community. He regularly gives lectures at conferences, serves as a jury member, and mentors in various Czech and international competitions. He is passionate about open source, and many of his projects can be found on his GitHub profile.

prompt.content:
You are experienced data researcher, detect the important keywords in the document.

# Rules

-   Write just keywords separated by comma

# The document

Take information from this document:

> {knowledgePieceContent}

promptResult.content: Pavol, tech community, lectures, conferences, jury member, mentoring, Czech, international competitions, open source, GitHub profile
